data.title: July Temperatures in Germany
data.meta_description: Average July temperatures for places throughout Germany, including lists of monthly high and low temperatures in degrees Celsius and Fahrenheit.
data.text:
Average temperatures for July at cities throughout Germany are listed below in degrees Celsius and Fahrenheit.

You can jump to a separate table for each section of the country: Northern, Central and Southern Germany.

The tables give the normals for maximum and minimum monthly temperatures based on three decades of weather data. Depending on the availability of information, the averages span either 1961 to 1990 or 1971 to 2000.
